title: Charlotte Domingos
description: Charlotte Domingos is a movie director who needed a website to display her late short movie entitled Its almost 8 and her previous works. My mission was to create her brand identity, work with her on the design on the website and develop it.

title: Space traveler
description: A click game created for a school project of 5 persons. It takes place in space where you have to get gems as much as possible to build the spaceship and discover others planets. I was in charge of leading the project and develop it.

title: Medela 20 ans
description: During my internship in at Basaltiq, I had the responsibility of developing a website for the 20th anniversary of Medela, a baby equipment company.
